synthesis_conditions.solvents: Dried and freshly distilled acetone (30 mL)
synthesis_conditions.notes: Crystals decomposed above -10°C and quickly lost solvent molecules on contact with air

synthesis_conditions.reactants: BaI2 (0.5 g, 1.28 mmol) (dried in high vacuum at 500°C)
synthesis_conditions.solvents: Dried and freshly distilled THF (50 mL)
synthesis_conditions.time: After concentration to half the volume and layering with diethyl ether (10 mL)
synthesis_conditions.notes: Sensitive to air and reacts at room temperature under elimination of solvent molecules

synthesis_conditions.reactants: BaI2 (0.4 g, 1 mmol; dried as in 3)
